website_summaries.verdict: Expensive, but the results are more detailed and user-specific than usual. No genetic health component, but great for family history enthusiasts.
pros: Testing process very easy, with fast results
cons: Expensive test for what some users consider generic results
Generated report is lengthy and scientific, and somewhat difficult to interpret

customer_reviews.title: As it turned out the fault was mine as the instructions were clearly marked and easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: I received my initial test kit and was unclear on what to do. I found their customer service people to be extremely helpful and caring. As it turned out the fault was mine as the instructions were clearly marked and easy to understand. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good company
customer_reviews.text: It was great fun to enter into the genetic genealogy field and test my autosomal DNA. The results are very helpful in discovering who my ancestors were as a people group - not just their names. The whole process from ordering, collecting a sample, and receiving results was quick and easy. The support you get after you receive your results is also helpful and they will work with you one-on-one if you so desire. Good company and would recommend them to anyone. I especially like the privacy that comes with your results.
customer_reviews.author: JPN

customer_reviews.title: ... more only because I don't think they did a good job of letting your know that this is a ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 3 stars instead of more only because I don't think they did a good job of letting your know that this is a very "scientific" result... great info and quick service, but the results were very technical and took some time and research to understand. Data could be presented in a more user friendly format
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Exciting and informative trip through time
customer_reviews.text: My DNA-Fingerprint Plus analysis confirmed that which I already knew: I had British genes. Lakota Sioux genes, Austrian genes. But it also led me into the beginning of my genetic history. I knew some facts about my ancestors several generations back. But this test expanded those "branches" and suggested the origins of known ancestors, filling in a more complete mapping of my genetic makeup. The trip was exciting and opened my mind to generations from the beginning. My DNA-Fingerprint Plus analysis was the finest birthday gift I could have ever received.
customer_reviews.author: 90 Great Years

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this test to anyone serious about their genealogy and ...
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this test to anyone serious about their genealogy and wanting to know where they came from. I took the Native American dna fingerprint plus test back in 2016, it confirmed my native american connections to northern Ontario and Saskatchewan which are 1st Nations populations. My European matches were right on as well along with our Jewish ancestry from my mothers side of the family. The customer service is great, if you have any questions about your report they are easy to contact and take the time to go over your results.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Logan

customer_reviews.title: Best DNA Test Available
customer_reviews.text: This test is extremely detailed and well worth it. It provides matches to cities and states. I was able to confirm Native American ancestry that other companies could not confirm. It is so detailed that it even confirmed Cherokee ancestry for both me and my mother. This is a great test for anyone who is very " mixed."
customer_reviews.author: Megan R

customer_reviews.title: Melugeon testing
customer_reviews.text: My son did this testing specifically for the Melungeon ancestry results. This test was the best of the best. It's one thing to get some vague area of the world results, but to find out how your family got to where they are today is awesome. I needed real results due to medical reasons and the results from this testing gave us what we needed. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: As an adoptee, I'm so grateful that I was able to find out my Jewish heritage through DNA consultants. I had chosen the Jewish DNA fingerprint plus because I'm adopted and needed answers for both my maternal/paternal side. Their detailed report and introduction letter was very helpful. They were even able to match me to my Jewish population. I highly recommend DNA consultants. Lyndsey
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this kit for my husband's 90th birthday later this month. I know he will appreciate adding this info to what he already knows about "his people." A DNA kit is great unique gift and what could be more personal? Plus, at 90, he has received many thoughtful gifts, but I know he doesn't have this. It will be surprise gift appropriate, really, for any special person or celebration.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Adams

customer_reviews.title: Made a very good gift!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this DNA kit for my boyfriend for Christmas. We have looked at several options & this is exactly what he wanted. We received it in just 2 days & are awaiting the results! He is so excited because he and his family members have only been able to guess the whereabouts of their origins so far. I am happy I was able to give him such a unique and meaningful gift this year. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Teresa has really good Customer Service and is always patient and available to ...
customer_reviews.text: Teresa and Donald Yates give you top rate, scientific results. Teresa has really good Customer Service and is always patient and available to answer your questions. If you call and leave a message, someone will always get back to you . I have taken 2 test with this company: the 18 marker and the 18 marker plus. The 18 marker plus is so detailed, with rankings, graphs, definitions and maps. You will not be disappointed and I believe the results to be very thorough.
customer_reviews.author: Rizpah

product_meta.title: DNA Fingerprint Plus
product_meta.description: Our exclusive, best-selling DNA Fingerprint Plus Test examines standard locations on your whole-genome DNA and gives you a comprehensive picture of your ancestry based on mother’s side, father’s side and all your ancestral lines. The time depth is historical, not ancient. The matches should make sense in the light of recent genealogy (200 - 500 years). The report lists your top 50 world populations (including a limited number of American Indian tribes, Sephardic, Ashkenazi and other Jewish matches, Romani/Gypsy and other exotic groups), top 10 countries of Europe and top 10 “megapopulations” mixture (broad ethnic categories such as Northern European, African and American Indian). Additionally, it tells you if your profile contains any of 18 newly discovered ethnic markers: 2 are Native American, 4 are Jewish, others are European, African and Asian. The process is easy. Amazon sends you a package with a collection kit and instructions. You collect a sample by rubbing two swabs inside your mouth and return them via a prepaid envelope. Your sample is analyzed according to 16 standard STR markers, also called CODIS markers, your individual DNA profile. Your comprehensive report with matches, world ancestry map and certificate is emailed to you in a pdf within two weeks of receipt of your sample by our lab. Hard copies, upgrades and follow-up testing available, along with open-ended customer service to answer all your questions, M-F 10am-6pm Mountain Time,
feature_bullets: Best selling test ordered by clients who want more details than Ancestry.com, 23andme or any other company provides
Discover your genetic ancestry down to the specific country level instead of just broad regions
Personally prepared DNA ancestry report, listing your family's ancestral countries of origin in Europe ranked in order of predominance and recent history
Unique certificate documenting your test and its results
Ideal for exploring your genetic roots to American Indian, Irish, English, Scottish, Welsh, German, Italian, French and Russian ancestry (along with many, MANY more)
